dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7154 IH: He Did That Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cawthorn introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To require the President to report to Congress on authorities relating to the stabilization and reduction of gas prices, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the He Did That Act.

section.header: Report on authorities relating to gas prices
section.text: Not later than 30 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the President shall submit to Congress a report that identifies existing authorities that the President may use to help stabilize and reduce gas prices.
